sentence: Looking at options trading activity among components of the S&P 500 index, there is noteworthy activity today in Salesforce.com Inc (Symbol: CRM), where a total volume of 14,334 contracts has been traded thus far today, a contract volume which is representative of approximately 1.4 million underlying shares (given that every 1 contract represents 100 underlying shares).
That number works out to 54% of CRM's average daily trading volume over the past month, of 2.7 million shares.
Especially high volume was seen for the $72.50 strike call option expiring August 14, 2015 , with 2,420 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 242,000 underlying shares of CRM.

Below is a chart showing CRM's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $72.50 strike highlighted in orange:

AFLAC Inc. (Symbol: AFL) saw options trading volume of 10,447 contracts, representing approximately 1.0 million underlying shares or approximately 53.5% of AFL's average daily trading volume over the past month, of 2.0 million shares.
Particularly high volume was seen for the $62.50 strike call option expiring August 21, 2015 , with 4,846 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 484,600 underlying shares of AFL.

Below is a chart showing AFL's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $62.50 strike highlighted in orange:

And Northrop Grumman Corp (Symbol: NOC) saw options trading volume of 5,789 contracts, representing approximately 578,900 underlying shares or approximately 49.6% of NOC's average daily trading volume over the past month, of 1.2 million shares.
Particularly high volume was seen for the $190 strike call option expiring September 18, 2015 , with 2,581 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 258,100 underlying shares of NOC.

Below is a chart showing NOC's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $190 strike highlighted in orange:
